mapper.update:
update tab_pb_lead_team_member
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
person_name = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positive_id = #{positiveId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
positive_name = #{positiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenure_mode = #{tenureMode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tenure_begin = #{tenureBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tenure_duration = #{tenureDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tenure_leave = #{tenureLeave,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
as_committee_member = #{asCommitteeMember,jdbcType=TINYINT},
as_committee_director = #{asCommitteeDirector,jdbcType=TINYINT},
lead_member_order = #{leadMemberOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ebl_flag = #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
approval_number= #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rank = #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_pb_lead_team_member set org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, person_name = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, positive_id = #{positiveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, positive_name = #{positiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenure_mode = #{tenureMode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, tenure_begin = #{tenureBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tenure_duration = #{tenureDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, tenure_leave = #{tenureLeave,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, as_committee_member = #{asCommitteeMember,jdbcType=TINYINT}, as_committee_director = #{asCommitteeDirector,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lead_member_order = #{leadMemberOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ebl_flag = #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}
where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id FROM sys_user u where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update tab_pb_lead_team_member set del_flag=1 where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update tab_pb_lead_team_member set del_flag=1 where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, a.attachment_instance as pictures FROM tab_pb_lead_team_member t LEFT JOIN tab_pb_attachment a ON t.member_id = a.host_id AND a.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON t.org_id = d.dept_id WHERE lead_team_id = #{leadTeamId} AND t.del_flag = 0 AND a.attachment_type = 38 ORDER BY t.member_id

SELECT l.*, d.`name` AS deptName FROM `tab_pb_lead_team_member` AS l LEFT JOIN tab_pb_lead_team t2 ON l.lead_team_id = t2.lead_team_id AND t2.current = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS d ON d.dept_id = t2.org_id AND d.del_flag = 0 WHERE l.del_flag = 0
AND d.dept_id = (SELECT parent_id FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_id = #{deptId})
AND l.person_name like concat(concat("%",#{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),"%")
select * from tab_pb_lead_team_member WHERE lead_team_id=#{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = '0'

SELECT l.*, d.name as deptName, a.attachment_instance as pictures, u.realname as deptName, u.id_card_no as idCardNo FROM tab_pb_lead_team_member l LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON l.org_id = d.dept_id left join tab_pb_attachment a on host_id =l.member_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON l.user_id= u.user_id WHERE l.member_id =#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.attachment_type='38' and a.del_flag=0

select COUNT(l.as_committee_member) from tab_pb_lead_team_member l LEFT JOIN tab_pb_lead_team lt ON l.lead_team_id =lt.lead_team_id WHERE l.lead_team_id =#{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND lt.del_flag =0 and l.del_flag=0
SELECT m.lead_team_id from tab_pb_lead_team_member m WHERE m.member_id =#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag =1 LIMIT 1

SELECT l.* FROM tab_pb_lead_team_member l LEFT JOIN tab_pb_lead_team m ON l.lead_team_id = m.lead_team_id WHERE l.user_id =#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND m.lead_team_id =#{leadTeamId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND l.del_flag = 0 AND m.del_flag =0
